last_episode_to_air.name: Part 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: Detective Joe Kozenczak is under pressure from community leaders and his superiors to close down the investigation of suspect John Wayne Gacy.

name: To Catch a Killer
overview: The true gruesome story of John Wayne Gacy - a good friend and helpful neighbour, a great child entertainer, a respectful businessman, and a violent serial killer who raped and murdered over 30 young boys.

episodes.name: Part 1
episodes.overview: Detective Joe Kozenczak begins a grisly cat-and-mouse game with Chicago building contractor John Wayne Gacy, a pillar of the community and tireless charity worker, who is connected with the latest disappearance.

episodes.name: Part 2
episodes.overview: Detective Joe Kozenczak is under pressure from community leaders and his superiors to close down the investigation of suspect John Wayne Gacy.
